about_me_section.headline: About Me
about_me_section.about_me: I'm Akshit Thakur, a dedicated Computer Science student with a passion for software development and emerging technologies. I enjoy solving complex problems, building efficient solutions, and continuously learning to stay ahead in the tech world.

education.title: High School
education.description: Completed high school with a strong academic background in Science and Mathematics. Developed problem-solving skills through academic projects and actively participated in extracurricular activities, fostering a keen interest in technology and innovation.

education.description: Currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science. Acquiring expertise in programming, software development, and emerging technologies. Engaged in coding competitions, hackathons, and tech-related events to enhance practical knowledge and industry exposure.

education.title: Web Development Internship

Worked on real-world projects, enhancing skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks. Collaborated with a team to develop responsive and interactive web applications.
